title: Material Design Update
message:
Material Design Update

Updated Icons for the Side Tray:

* Home Icon
* Exports
* Accounts
* Settings
* Feedback

Icons have been downloaded from google here:
https://design.google.com/icons/

For all icons I have downloaded the 24dp PNG versions.

Icon assets are updated in the following folders:

drawable-hdpi
drawable-mdpi
drawable-xhdpi
drawable-xxhdpi
drawable-xxxhdpi
* This last one is a new folder that google has added. as the images
are already there from google I figured I'd include them as well. All
images described above are in this folder.

Specifics for each icon update:

Home Icon
Replaced current storymaker icon with an updated icon from the material
design recommendations that is for Home screens.

Exports
I believe we are using "ic_home_projects.png" for the current exports
icon, or something similar to it. I have added a new icon from the
material design set to replace it. The filename for the new icon is
"ic_nav_exports.png", please update all export icons accordingly.

Accounts
The current icon in use is "ic_nav_preferences.png" I have added a new
icon to the folder from the material design library, and given it a
proper file name.

Settings Icon
Replaced current gear with an updated icon from the official material
design recommendations.

Feedback Icon
Currently we’re using "ic_nav_upload.png", there is an official icon
now included in the material design assets, which I’ve added here. It’s
named "ic_nav_feedback.png". Please update all feedback icon references
accordingly.
